results.content: I like how Sudheer takes his time in explaining everything we need to know. His teaching techniques are great.

results.content: I am using Udemy for last 6 years and never found such a awful teaching methodology. Every class starts with something new with out completing previous lecture. No terminology explained at all and directly jumped on implementation. I must say this course should be removed from Udemy altogether.
